content.body: hober: by any chance, do you happen to know examples of "we found several examples of web pages that had incorrect behavior when requestAnimationFrame() callbacks were fired at a non-60Hz frequency." mentioned in https://github.com/WebKit/explainers/tree/main/animation-frame-rate ?
